title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Interactive Teaching Methods for Enhancing Social Sector Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more core principles of dialogic teaching methods (openness, co-construction, supportive atmosphere, etc.).
Learners can lead critical discussions two or more times when analyzing job-related cases using the literature circle technique.
Learners can incorporate peer feedback through dialogic interactions and improve job problem-solving solutions by 80% or more.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
